column2: Clear Blue sky with a light breeze. Temperature around 80.

column1: EMF in North Bay is not emergent yet.

column2: Partly cloudy- slight breeze. A nice day. Saw 1 loon. Milfoil not too bad in bay. Could row through the bay with no problem.
Eurasian Milfoil and Purple Loosestrife noted. Our bay looks much better than last year - can row in- not mats of milfoil like last 2 years. Partly cloudy- light wind and 80 degrees - a beautiful day

column1: Saw 3 cranes and caught quite a few rainbow trout.

column2: Blue skies and wind out of the NW. Small waves.

column1: 6 inches of rain the week before testing so lake was real high.

column2: Mostly Sunny with a SW wind of 10 to 15 MPH and 65 degrees. A beautiful day. Milfoil very evident by the park and the shallow North Bay. Maple Trees had red leaves - mostly green otherwise
Mostly clear with about a 10 mph wind from the south. Small waves.

column1: Not many weeds in the bay by our land on the North Shore

column2: Blooming Purple Loosetrife by Boat Landing and by County Park.

column1: A nice day - mid 70's- partly cloudy and low wind.
Eurasian Milfoil isn't as bad this year for some reason

column2: Purple Loosestrife blooming on South Shore by Park and Boat Landing.

column1: Eurasian Milfoil in far north bay was less than in the past- Could row through the bay with no problem No mats as before.
Mostly sunny with a light south wind.

column2: Eurasian Water Milfoil has gotten much worse than last year in the shallows of the north side of the lake- especially on the NW side by Whitecap property. Water is stirred up from rain. Day was mostly sunny with a 10 mph wind from the SW.. Has rained off and on the past two weeks. Noise pollution from home on NE shore. Very loud music!

Mostly cloudy with a South wind at 11 MPH. Air temperature was 70 degrees. Eurasian Water milfoil was worst on the Northwest corner . EWM was not emergent yet- but was thick. We saw two loons by the boat landing catching fish. A hawk circled overhead.
Beautiful sunny day- clear sky and a light wind.
